issuer.name: Northeastern University (NU)
issuer.description: Founded in 1898, we’re renowned for our experiential learning model, high-impact research, deep partnerships, and worldwide reach. From day one we’ve pursued innovative ways of teaching and research that place a premium on experience and engagement with the world. Today, our signature approach erases traditional boundaries, empowering not only students, but faculty, alumni, partners, and innovators to solve problems and pursue impact.

name: Graduate Leadership Institute
description: Earners of this badge participated in the Graduate Leadership Institute (GLI). They attended a series of eight theory-based, interactive, leadership development sessions. Earners developed skills through activities designed to explore leadership competencies, discussion of case studies and participation in weekly self-reflections. They completed the program with a group presentation about a specific leadership competency.

criteria.narrative:
- Demonstrate understanding for leadership development theory and learning domains through a group presentation on a specific leadership competency
- Gain insights through the CliftonStrengths assessment to adapt to a myriad of challenges faced by leaders in their professional fields utilizing their natural strengths
- Connect social justice activities with leadership development
- Provide and accept constructive feedback to and from peers
